title: Swift YOLO Person Detection
long_description: The Swift YOLO Person Detection is a lightweight, real-time object detection model optimized for edge devices. Trained on the person detection dataset and implemented in TensorFlow, it provides fast and accurate human presence detection in resource-constrained environments.  It is Ideal for embedded and IoT applications where speed and accuracy are critical.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Deploy the pre-trained model to your PSOC™ Edge Eval Kit
